00022 #ifndef NEWTS_UIUC_H
00023 #define NEWTS_UIUC_H
00024 
00025 #include "newts/newts.h"
00026 
00027 /* These are the options specific to the UIUC backend. */
00028 
00029 struct uiuc_opts
00030 {
00031   int deleted_notes;
00032   int deleted_resps;
00033   int expire_threshold;
00034   int expire_action;
00035   int expire_by_dirmsg;
00036   int minimum_notes;
00037   int maximum_note_size;
00038   int notesfile_number;
00039   int current_note_id;
00040   int unused;
00041 };
00042 
00043 /* Expiration actions */
00044 
00045 enum expire_actions
00046   {
00047     KEEPDFLT = 0,
00048     KEEPNO,
00049     KEEPYES
00050   };
00051 
00052 /* Expire with director message options */
00053 
00054 enum expire_with_dirmsg_opts
00055   {
00056     DIRDFLT = 0,
00057     DIRNOCARE,
00058     DIRON,
00059     DIROFF,
00060     DIRANYON
00061   };
00062
